publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3947 Irene Oldfather: North Ayrshire Schools Concert—That the Parliament congratulates North Ayrshire Council’s educational services department on hosting the forthcoming 10th Anniversary Flagship Concert at the Royal ConcertH Hall in Glasgow, due to take place on Friday 24 February 2006; notes that this year’s concert will feature the North Ayrshire junior, intermediate and senior choirs, concert band, training band, string orchestras, symphony orchestra, traditional music students and the Stanecastle Band, meaning that over 400 students from across North Ayrshire will take to the stage to showcase their musical talents; acknowledges the hard work and practice that all these young people will have committed in recent months to prepare for the event, and sends its best wishes to North Ayrshire Council, the pupils and teaching staff involved for a very successful event.
